Name: CLion
Notes:
installer: https://www.jetbrains.com/help/clion/installation-guide.html
but their installer still sucks; apparently *can* change directory without silent install and config file
    but if you want a real silent install, have to use a 'silent.config' file to specify options,
    can't uninstall/clean up their old versions using that,
    and it will be completely silent (i.e. hidden); ugh and ffs
PreInstallMessage: installer may prompt for elevation, but just decline it to install to user profile; and make sure to select options to uninstall old versions to properly clean things up

    but if you want a real silent install, have to use a 'silent.config' file to specify options,
    can't uninstall/clean up their old versions using that,
    and it will be completely silent (i.e. hidden); ugh and ffs
PreInstallMessage: installer may prompt for elevation, but just decline it to install to user profile; and make sure to select options to uninstall old versions to properly clean things up
PreInstallScript:
$cfgfile = Join-Path $context.DownloadFolder 'opts.cfg'
Set-Content -Path $cfgfile -Encoding utf8nobom -Value @'
mode=user
launcher32=0
lanucher64=0
updatePATH=0
updateContextMenu=0
jre32=0
'@
